definition: surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
flower/earlobe/fig. item on both sides/classifier for flowers, clouds etc
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: So, apps such as Pandora internet radio can be listened to while reading the news using another app.
sentences.chinese: 例如你在阅读新闻的时候同时收听潘朵拉网络广播。

sentences.english: Aggrega is new site that was built to be a Pandora for music videos.
sentences.chinese: Aggrega是一个类似于潘朵拉的视频分享网站。

sentences.english: The best example of this system is the Pandora music recommendation service.
sentences.chinese: 最好的例子，这个制度是潘朵拉的音乐推荐服务。

sentences.english: Pandora was sent to the earth and was presented to Epimetheus.
sentences.chinese: 潘朵拉被派到人间送给伊比米修斯。

sentences.english: She told Pandora that her name was Hope.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉潘朵拉说，她的名字是希望。

definition: Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
Poseidon, God of the sea in Greek mythology
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
variant of 羅睺|罗睺[luo2 hou2]
